017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.Type;
020import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
021
022/**
023 * A {@link WildcardType} implementation that has only {@linkplain
024 * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bounds}.
025 *
026 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
027 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
028 *
029 * @see WildcardType
030 *
031 * @see WildcardType#getUpperBounds()
032 */
033public final class UpperBoundedWildcardType extends AbstractWildcardType {
034
035
036  /*
037   * Constructors.
038   */
039
040
041  /**
042   * Creates a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}.
043   *
044   * @param upperBound the sole {@linkplain
045   * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bound}; may be {@code null}
046   * in which case an array consisting solely of {@link Object
047   * Object.class} will be used instead
048   */
049  public UpperBoundedWildcardType(final Type upperBound) {
050    super(upperBound == null ? (Type[])null : new Type[] { upperBound }, null);
051  }
052
053  /**
054   * Creates a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}.
055   *
056   * @param upperBounds the {@linkplain
057   * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bounds};
058   * may be {@code null}
059   */
060  public UpperBoundedWildcardType(final Type[] upperBounds) {
061    super(upperBounds, null);
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Creates a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}.
066   *
067   * @param wildcardType the {@link WildcardType} whose {@link
068   * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bounds} will be effectively
069   * copied; may be {@code null}
070   * in which case an array consisting solely of {@link Object
071   * Object.class} will be used instead
072   */
073  public UpperBoundedWildcardType(final WildcardType wildcardType) {
074    super(wildcardType == null ? new Type[] { Object.class } : wildcardType.getUpperBounds(), null);
075  }
076
077
078  /*
079   * Static methods.
080   */
081
082
083  /**
084   * If the supplied {@link WildcardType} is a {@link
085   * UpperBoundedWildcardType}, returns it; otherwise creates a new
086   * {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType} with the supplied {@link
087   * WildcardType}'s {@linkplain WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper
088   * bounds} and returns it.
089   *
090   * @param wildcardType the {@link WildcardType} to effectively copy
091   * (or return); may be {@code null} in which case upper bounds
092   * consisting of an array consisting solely of {@link Object
093   * Object.class} will be used instead
094   *
095   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}
096   *
097   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code wildcardType} is {@code
098   * null}
099   *
100   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
101   *
102   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
103   * that it may return a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType} with
104   * each invocation).
105   *
106   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
107   * threads.
108   */
109  public static final UpperBoundedWildcardType of(final WildcardType wildcardType) {
110    if (wildcardType instanceof UpperBoundedWildcardType w) {
111      return w;
112    } else {
113      return new UpperBoundedWildcardType(wildcardType);
114    }
115  }
116
117
118}
